bu_jdi.speaker: bu_jdi
bu_jdi.text: Hey! Ready for a duel? I've been working on my deck all morning!

bu_jdi.speaker: bu_jdi
bu_jdi.text: My Elemental Heroes are getting stronger every day. I can feel it!

bu_sho.speaker: bu_sho
bu_sho.text: Oh, hi there! Have you seen big bro Jaden around?

bu_sho.speaker: bu_sho
bu_sho.text: I'm still practicing with my Vehicroids. They're pretty cool, right?

bu_ask.speaker: bu_ask
bu_ask.text: The academy grounds are lovely at this time of day, don't you think?

bu_ask.speaker: bu_ask
bu_ask.text: If you're looking for a challenge, I won't go easy on you.

bu_jun.speaker: bu_jun
bu_jun.text: Hmph. Don't get in my way. I'm The Chazz, after all.

bu_jun.speaker: bu_jun
bu_jun.text: Chazz it up! Nobody can beat my Armed Dragon deck!

bu_dai.speaker: bu_dai
bu_dai.text: I've been analyzing the latest duel statistics. Fascinating data.

bu_dai.speaker: bu_dai
bu_dai.text: With the right calculations, any duel can be won. It's all about probability.
